channel.title: Shortcuts on OJ's Perspective
channel.description: Recent content in Shortcuts on OJ's Perspective

item.title: Shortcuts: Visual Studio 2005
item.description: Welcome to the next in the series of posts on program shortcuts. This time round we’re talking Visual Studio. I’ll be assuming that you don’t have the ViEmu plugin enabled and that you’re just using the IDE in the way it was intended without any other form of shortcut-based plugin installed. I’m using Visual Studio 2005 and I think I have the C# settings enabled by default. Most of these shortcuts will work regardless of the default setting that you have, but some of them will no doubt be different.
